name: establishes
value: establishes the connections between the Universal Mapping Property Axiom and other core axioms
description: The Universal Mapping Property Axiom resource establishes how this axiom connects to all other core axioms, confirming intrinsic primes as fundamental building blocks, depending on unique factorization, elevating the prime-coordinate homomorphism to canonical status, providing theoretical justification for canonical representation, aligning with coherence metrics, and supporting trilateral coherence
